span.strong: UPDATE ON GRAB AND GO MEAL DISTRIBUTION

br.br: The Grab and Go meals for Thursday AND Friday will be picked up on Thursday. There will be no Friday pick up. This will be the weekly schedule going forward.

br.strong: UPDATE ON GRAB AND GO MEAL DISTRIBUTION

br.br: Stroud Public Schools will also be including a breakfast offering in the grab-and-go meal distribution which begins Monday, March 23. The distribution time for the lunch/breakfast pickups will remain the same at 11:00 am. to 12:00 p.m. at the west end of Parkview Elementary.

span.strong: GRAB AND GO MEALS TO BE MADE AVAILABLE

br.br: Stroud Public Schools will be providing a grab-and-go meal to all students/children, ages 0-18, starting Monday, March 23, 2020. This availability will be for the duration of the mandated school closure and on weekdays, only. Meals will be disbursed in a drive-thru fashion at the west end of Parkview Elementary between 11:00 a.m. and 12:00 p.m. Please note, federal guidelines require that the student/child be present to obtain the meal.
